item.title: xsl fix
item.description:
xsl fix by DC :
Use relative location of images directory.

item.title: xmap add
item.description:
xmap add by DC :
Added better sitemap match using regexp to deal with sub-directories too.

item.title: code fix
item.description:
code fix by DC :
Replace use of document() function in changes2rss.xml with sitemap aggregation.

item.title: xsl fix (bug FOR-455)
item.description:
xsl fix by DC (fixes bug FOR-455)
:
Use the "title" attribute of "changes" and "todo" tags if it exists, otherwise use the hard-coded values. Thanks to Cyriaque Dupoirieux.

item.title: code update
item.description:
code update by RDG :
Move ToDo and Changes pipelines to this plugin, from core.

item.title: admin add
item.description:
admin add by RDG :
Initial plugin code.
